item.title: Q&A with the SharePoint MVP Experts Chat On Oct 29th @1pm EST or 10am PDT
item.author: vbiret+blog@outlook.com (Vincent Biret)
item.description: Hello everyone Microsoft is launching a SharePoint MVP Expert Chats again! Have questions about SharePoint 2010 or 2013? Or SharePoint Online? Office 365? Please join us October 29th at 1pm EST or 10am PDT where you can have your questions answered live! We will be using the Reddit Ask Me Anything format. This is new to us but many of Microsoft teams are using this medium now. Please create a Reddit account beforehand so you can be ready to ask questions.
